summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganKnours. Power Elasticity-Boosting Plump Pad features a trademarked six plant extract complex to boost skin elasticity by increasing procollagen production and smooth fine lines for a youthful glow.
details: DetailsBenefitsPre-soaked pads are easy to use as a toner after cleansing or as a quick and easy maskMoisturizing, firming, age-defying tonerHydrates and boosts skin elasticity for a youthful glowFormula is non-toxic and fragrance-freeKey IngredientsSix plant extracts (Artemisia Leaf, Holy Basil Leaf, Cotton Seed, Capsella Bursa-Pastoris, Oat, and Nettle Extracts) to help boost skin elasticity & smooth fine linesItem 2626226How To UseAfter thoroughly cleansing skin, use one or two pads to gently wipe along entire skin surface. For better results, leave pads on skin for 5 mins before wiping.Precautions: For external use only. Do not swallow. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.IngredientsWater, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Glycereth-25 PCA Isostearate, Sodium Citrate, Artemisia Princeps Leaf Extract, Citric Acid, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Gossypium Herbaceum (Cotton) Seed Extract, Zea Mays (Corn) Kernel Extract, Capsella Bursa-Pastoris Extract, Disodium EDTA, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Allantoin, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Panthenol, Fructan, Glucose.
how_to_use: After thoroughly cleansing skin, use one or two pads to gently wipe along entire skin surface. For better results, leave pads on skin for 5 mins before wiping.Precautions: For external use only. Do not swallow. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.

reviews.headline: love these
reviews.comments: I bought these a few months ago and I use Zo skin health pads first and then one of these and then proceed with my routine and my skin is sooo much better. Not just from this. I redid my routine and started drinking a lot more water and my skin is like someone else's. Spent years with stuff pilling and not working, applying moisturizer 3x a day and still dry. I wake up with moisturized skin now but I have a many step routine now but less than before. I think this helps a lot. Do with this info what you want. Lol.

reviews.headline: Super Convenient
reviews.comments: It's so convenient to use these pads to apply toner after washing my face. They leave my skin feeling smooth and hydrated. Nice packaging too!

reviews.headline: Gives plump and youthful glow!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this!! I use one sheet directly after I wash my face and I use two sheets if my face is feeling really dry (but one sheet is usually enough) then I follow it with a toner and moisturizer. It leaves my skin glowing and plump I tell you!! I could notice a difference after about a week of using it every night. The best part it didn't break my sensitive skin out. Get it right now if you want glowing moisturized and plump skin.

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments: Toner pads seem to be everywhere lately so finally decided to try this one. I've been using these daily morning and night for a month now. The pads are amazing, so soothing and love using them as a toner! Will keep using for sure.

faceoff_positive.comments: I've been using the Power Elasticity-Boosting Plump Pad recently, and I'm really pleased with the results. This pad contains plant extracts designed to improve skin elasticity and reduce fine lines. After cleansing, I applied the pad and left it on for about 5 minutes, and I could feel my skin becoming more hydrated and smooth almost immediately.  The pad feels very gentle on the skin, so it didn't cause any irritation, even on sensitive areas. While I haven't noticed significant changes in elasticity just yet, my skin does feel softer and more nourished after each use.  Overall, it's an easy-to-use product that provides a nice boost of hydration and firmness, and I'd recommend it to anyone looking to improve their skincare routine.
faceoff_positive.headline: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small Pad, Huge Impact!

faceoff_negative.comments: Excited for this brand due to natural ingredients and sensitive skin. It honestly doesn't do anything except cause a rash and MORE redness. Buyer beware that NO returns are accepted unless unopened and unused. Bummed and avoiding this brand now.
faceoff_negative.headline: Causes rash on sensitive skin and can't be returne
